description:
After falling asleep Tsukimori awoke hearing Hino playing. Upon returning to school, Tsukimori is chased by school newspaper reporter Nami Amo. He stumbles upon Hino who just finished practicing her violin and covers her mouth when Amo`s voice is heard just outside and after she passes, he releases his cover over her mouth prompting her to leave. Walking away, Hino comments on how she felt Tsukimori`s cold hand before and this time it was hot with a burning feeling, realizing what`s happened she runs back to the practice room to discover Tsukimori leaning against the wall almost unconscious.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 秘めやかなデュエット
